parameters.name: Lock
parameters.description: Locks the Liquid Digital Valve, when set to 1. Unlocks it, when set to 0.

parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the Liquid Digital Valve on, when set to 1. Turns it off, when set to 0.

outputs.name: Maximum
outputs.description: Returns 100. (Assumption) Returns the maximum throughput percentage of the Liquid Digital Valve.

outputs.name: Lock
outputs.description: Returns whether the Liquid Digital Valve is locked. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Error
outputs.description: Returns whether the Liquid Digital Valve is currently flashing an error. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Setting
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 100.0. Does not function. (Assumption) Returns the percentage of opening of the Liquid Digital Valve.

outputs.name: RequiredPower
outputs.description: Returns the current amount of power needed for the Liquid Digital Valve.

outputs.name: Ratio
outputs.description: Returns a range from 0.0 to 1.0. Does not function. (Assumption) Returns the differential in pressure between the sides of the Liquid Digital Valve.

outputs.name: Prefab Hash
outputs.description: (Assumption) Returns (-517628750) a unique type identifier for the Liquid Digital Valve.

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: Returns whether the Liquid Digital Valve is receiving power and is turned on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the Liquid Digital Valve is set to on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)
